name: Unbound
description: Unbound specializes in creating Metaverse as a Service solutions for B2B partners. We bring events, venues like museums and galleries as well as stores and showrooms into the virtual world. Our application focuses on creating conditions from the real world, so features such as multiplayer, audio zones with access management, AI-powered humanoid assistants, streaming from the real world in the metaverse and much more are implemented.
